route="o gen text"]KidPass gets your child into the best activities in your city. Get access to exclusive events, classes, camps, museums, and more. Unlock a new world of experiences at members-only prices. Explore different programs and find new interests. 
Makes it easy and fun to try out activities. Go to a different activity everyday, or take up to 3 visits per month to the same provider for drop-in classes.
